divs: sighting details1. i was in my truck turning onto crispin street from willits road in the holmesburg section of ne philly. 2. i always take note of any helicopters in the sky to see if they are police, news, etc. 3. i knew it was a black helicopter. 4. it was a black helicopter speeding real fast in the sky in a sw direction towards center city\downtown philly. 5. i was excited to see a black helicopter in the sy in broad daylight. 6. the black helicopter flew away over the horizon very fast. i am a mufon field investigator in ne philly so if anyone else saw this, please contact me @ cripplers08@aol.com or mufon12347@yahoo.com because i would really like to talk to you about this. my 16 year old son just told me that he always sees black helicopters with no markings around here in the sky. what the heck is up???
Summary: I saw a Black Helicopter speeding SW in the sky.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around July 25th 2008
